text: Escalaplano (Scaleprànu) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Province of Sud Sardegna in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 2,196 people lived there. Its area is 94.04 km². It is 338 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == Category:Communes of the Province of South Sardinia
title: Escalaplano
